name: Dodgy Defender: Rogue 11 / Monk 11 / Dwarven Defender 18
author: foojin

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
In the search engine, I searched for Rogue / Monk / DD, and found none at all, so here I am fixing that. This build can find and disable epic traps, but he will have to bash locks. Epic Dodge plus 12/- damage resistance (or reduction? I get those confused) makes this character hard to kill, and dual-wielding kamas helps him dish out some damage. However, since he is a kama-wielding DEXer, he will fare better in a high-magic world. Optionally, you could replace the trap-handling skills with the stealth skills.

posts.content: Why not rogue 13 and monk 9, this for more SA damage and you can get crippling strike.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
foojin wrote:Why not rogue 13 and monk 9, this for more SA damage and you can get crippling strike.
You'd lose an AC from Monk 10, and you'd lose poison immunity from Monk 11, and you'd get an EXP penalty. Still, it might be worth it. In addition to the benefits you mentioned, you'd also get a few more skill points.
